dynamic-hibernate.query: select t from Department t Where t.delFlag = :delFlag #if($deptName && $deptName.length() > 0) AND t.deptName like concat('%', :deptName, '%') #end #if($deptCode && $deptCode.length() > 0) AND t.deptCode like concat('%', :deptCode, '%') #end and t.type = '1' order by t.sort asc

select d.id,d.dept_name as deptName,d.dept_code as deptCode from department d where d.del_flag = :delFlag #if($deptName && $deptName.length() > 0) AND d.dept_name = :deptName #end #if($deptCode && $deptCode.length() > 0) AND d.dept_code = :deptCode #end order by d.sort asc
